metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2233 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the inbound_cap_ls function incommon/inbound.c in HexChat 2.10.2 allows remote IRC servers to cause adenial of service (crash) via a large number of options in a CAP LSmessage.

criterions.comment: hexchat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xchat-gnome: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
